message: Let's start with a fair deal. You get 10% now, and I'll take the rest. What do you say?
You're being too greedy! I'll give you a decent offer, but you have to take it now!
Okay, I'll come down a bit. Let's split it 70/30. We can't keep going back and forth forever.
You're still not giving me enough! I'll try to squeeze out a bit more, but don't expect me to be generous!
This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it down the middle and be done with it.
You're being reasonable now? Don't think you can just offer me a 50/50 split after being so greedy before!
Okay, I'll offer 60 for you, and 40 for me.  It's time to compromise and end this.  We're losing money with every round.
